response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,500. This is slightly above my cost but below the market average for similar products, aiming to ensure both a fair transaction and a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your consideration. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know.", "product_price": 10500}
